title: CcNFTs: Empowering Musicians
description: The Classical music field is dominated by centralization, making it dysfunctional and taking away from overall potential impact on the world
solution: Use CcNFTs as a foundation in giving artistic and financial autonomy to Classical and non-Classical musicians alike
experience: I received my MM in Orchestral Conducting from Peabody Institute of Johns Hopkins and have worked with world class musicians/institutions
